title: Window Size/Resolution Broken, unplayable, HELP! :|
body:
Already sent a support ticket, just looking for anyone else that can maybe help as well while I wait for a response.

Basically I try to get into game and my window size is smaller than I thought was possible. I get into game, but it's small and windowed, which are not my settings, and the graphics are all set to very low, which again aren't my settings. If i switch it to full screen on a higher resolution, it bugs and the minimap goes away, mouse isn't calibrated, etc. Bullshit ensues. Happens every time I load into a game. Can't seem to fix it even after uninstall/reinstalling client and initiating fix and letting it scan all my files. What gives?

http://imgur.com/a/MDipM

Pics on imgur above^^^^

replies.body: Putting in a ticket was a solid plan, our tech team can help out individually with this.  If you have a ticket number, I'd be happy to check on your status!
